attributes.action: Stop sezualization of young people from distorted Media images.
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, would like to change editorial magazines such as Vouge, to allow any Colour, Disability, Height restriction, Weight restriction to be banned to allow a right for all to be involved in the Fashion Industry, the Music Industry and the T.V. Industry without prejudice. And stop sexualization of young girls, causing serious risk and harm, to their Health and Psychological Well-Being
Involving Fashion Designers, Magazine Editorials, Media outlets, Press and the Music Industry for a time for change in attitudes towards beliefes and misinformation regarding the way you portray your fashion which, needs to be changed for healthy lifestlyes and not be led by misinformation and the air-brushing of images with the sexualization of young people.
